document_data.name: Maxam
document_data.mainbody: '''Maxam''' was the consort of [[Storm Silverhand]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Storm Silverhand considered Maxam's intelligence and kindness to rival her own, for whom adventuring was in the blood.
document_data.History: Maxam was an orphan. After they got together, Maxam went to live with Storm Silverhand in [[Shadowdale]],{{cite book/Forgotten Realms Adventures|107}} where he remained for a decade, though they were adventurers throughout that time. He perished in the summer of {{yearlink|1355}}, during a battle with [[tanar'ri]] at a ''[[gate]]'' opened by [[illithid]]s.
